account: We are sorry to hear you are having account issues! Please see our FAQ page for guidelines or submit a ticket! https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/sections/204864527-Account-maintenance-and-guidelines
You can check out our permissions update here! https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/222648408-Permissions-update
server: Due to the incredible number of Pokémon GO downloads, some Trainers are experiencing server connectivity issues. Don’t worry, our team is on it!
purchase: Have any questions about purchasing items? See our guide: https://support.pokemongo.nianticlabs.com/hc/en-us/articles/221957868-Pok%C3%A9Coins-and-making-In-App-Purchases
